name: pastefy
description: Pastefy is a lightweight and modern pastebin platform with authentication, versioning, and syntax highlighting. It is designed for private or public sharing with a responsive UI.
features: User authentication: Optional account system allows users to manage pastes, track history, and control access to content
Paste versioning: Edit pastes and maintain version history to track changes over time and restore previous versions
Syntax highlighting: Support for numerous programming languages with automatic detection and color-coded syntax display
Public and private: Choose visibility settings for each paste to share publicly, keep unlisted, or restrict to authenticated users
Folder organization: Organize pastes into folders for better management and categorization of related content
Responsive design: Mobile-optimized interface works seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and smartphone devices
API integration: RESTful API enables programmatic paste creation and retrieval for automation and tool integration
Expiration control: Set automatic deletion after specified time periods to manage storage and ensure temporary content removal
Search functionality: Find pastes quickly by title, content, or tags with full-text search across your paste collection
